directions: Place sausage in a large saucepan. Add water to cover and simmer over low heat for 1 hour. Drain, remove sausage and set aside.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

In the same saucepan combine the Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, onion, sugar, hot pepper sauce and  water. Bring all to a boil, stirring. Place reserved sausage in a 9x13-inch baking dish and cover it with the sauce mixture.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour.
ingredients: 2 pounds kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
title: Sweet Polish Sausage
